detectors.description:
LnTokenStorage (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#64-79) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- LnAdmin.admin (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#5)
	- LnAdmin.candidate (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#6)
	- LnAdmin.onlyAdmin() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#27-30)
	- LnAdmin.onlyAdmin() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#27-30)
	- LnAdmin.setCandidate(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#14-18)
	- LnAdmin.becomeAdmin() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#20-25)
	- LnAdmin.setCandidate(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#14-18)
	- LnAdmin.becomeAdmin() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#20-25)

detectors.description:
LnAdmin.setCandidate(address)._candidate (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#14) lacks a zero-check on :
		- candidate = _candidate (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#16)
Pragma version^0.6.12 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11
detectors.markdown: Pragma version[^0.6.12](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LnTokenStorage.sol#L2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11
